CustomField.formula: IF ( AND( /** OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Request"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Not Submitted"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "In Authoring"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "In Signatures")), **/ /** OR( ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c , 'Approved') , ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c , "Not Submitted"), ISPICKVAL( Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c , 'None') ), **/ NOT(APT_Is_Create_Contract_Batch_Job_Running__c), APT_Ratecards_Created__c, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Terminated"))), HYPERLINK("/apex/APT_CreateContractValidation?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/APT_Create_Green", "Create Contract Documents (One Click)"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Create Contracts
